attributes.action: Call for an audit of the colour coding of NHS pharmacy drug cupboard keys
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Often the colour on the lock doesn't match the colour on the key - and this is time consuming - basically dangerous in emergencies. Plastic caps cost 10 pence each  - the petitioner is calling on a logistical exercise that will save healthcare staff time and energy - it simply drives me bonkers
